title: Loin Cloth Or Kain Kebat (ritual Skirt), 1900–66
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: tied resist patterning in warp (ikat) on plain weave
description: Cotton panel seamed at ends, probably to form a garment--either a loin cloth or ritual skirt (kain kebat). Design highly stylized, geometric hooked pattern in white and dull red on dark brown ground. Woven borders in narrow red, green, and black stripes run the length of piece

type.name: Loin cloth or kain kebat (ritual skirt)

tombstone.epitaph:
Loin Cloth Or Kain Kebat (ritual Skirt), 1900–66.Medium: cotton
Technique: tied resist patterning in warp (ikat) on plain weave. 1966-17-4.
